verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In acceptance lieth peace.
Oh, my heart be still.
Let thy restless worries cease
And accept His will.
If this test be not thy choice:
It is His; therefore, rejoice.
In acceptance, in acceptance lieth peace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In His plan there cannot be
Aught to make thee sad.
If it is His choice for thee
Take it and be glad.
Make of it lovely thing
To the glory of theyKing,
In acceptance, in acceptance lieth peace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cease from sighs and murmurings.
Sing His loving grace.
This thing means thy furthering
To a wealthy place.
From thy cares He'll give release.
In acceptance lieth peace.
In acceptance, in acceptance lieth peace.
